definition: to examine sth and make a decision/to screen/to evaluate/to approve
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: To examine and approve the annual plans of commemorative and special stamps;
sentences.chinese: 负责审定纪念邮票和特种邮票年度计划。

sentences.english: Report the examined and approved qualified suppliers list of this project to company for record.
sentences.chinese: 将本项目审定合格的供货商名单报公司备案。

sentences.english: In charge of organizing and carrying out aero-products' airworthiness certification and management.
sentences.chinese: 负责组织实施公司航空产品的适航审定与管理工作。

sentences.english: Second, the re-registration approval, ban or the document establishments.
sentences.chinese: 二是重新登记审定，取缔无证照经营场所。

sentences.english: The content for inspection in each course will depend on the course syllabi in the department.
sentences.chinese: 各科审定内容依本系课程大纲为准。

sentences.english: And Keyu No. 2 was examined and approved by the cultivar registration committee of Hunan province in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 于2006年通过湖南省农作物品种审定委员会审定。

sentences.english: Early in America, the Science Society of China makes out the plan of censoring terms.
sentences.chinese: 早在美国，中国科学社就拟定了科学名词的审定计划。

sentences.english: She is also in charge of editing most translation works for the company.
sentences.chinese: 负责天语公司大部分中英互译稿件的终稿审定。

sentences.english: The Chinese shadow boxing is the universal, popularized set pattern after the validation of national Wushu authority.
sentences.chinese: 此拳术是经过国家武术权威机构审定的普及推广套路。

sentences.english: All the record attempts are assessed by adjudicators from the organisation.
sentences.chinese: 全部记录由来自该组织的评判员审定。

sentences.english: The beliefs of history and culture may well be validated and explicated through science.
sentences.chinese: 历史和文化的信仰很可能通过科学的审定和阐述。

sentences.english: In charge of aero-products related airworthiness certification affairs.

sentences.english: The Provincial Department of Personnel is the competent department that examines and determines the qualifications of foreign high-level talented people.
sentences.chinese: 省人事厅是审定外国籍高层次人才资格的主管部门。

sentences.english: The competition will be conducted in accordance with the latest edition of the Rules for the International Wushu Sanshou Competition.
sentences.chinese: 比赛采用国际武联审定的最新《武术散打竞赛规则》。

definition: to reconsider/to reexamine/to review (e.g. a report prior to accepting it)
to report for criticism/to submit for approval to higher authority
to report to one's superiors/to appear in the news/to reply to a letter
to report, requesting approval/written request for instructions
to review a judicial case/to reexamine
to make a draft/to draw up (plans)
